description: Has a 20% chance to confuse the target.

name: Doom-desire
description: Hits the target two turns later.

name: Psycho-boost
description: Lowers the user's Special Attack by two stages after inflicting damage.

name: Roost
description: Heals the user by half its max HP.

name: Gravity
description: Disables moves and immunities that involve flying or levitating for five turns.

name: Miracle-eye
description: Forces the target to have no evasion, and allows it to be hit by Psychic moves even if it's Dark.

name: Wake-up-slap
description: If the target is asleep, has double power and wakes it up.

name: Hammer-arm
description: Lowers user's Speed by one stage.

name: Gyro-ball
description: Power raises when the user has lower Speed, up to a maximum of 150.

name: Healing-wish
description: User faints.  Its replacement has its HP fully restored and any major status effect removed.

name: Brine
description: Has double power against Pokémon that have less than half their max HP remaining.

name: Natural-gift
description: Power and type depend on the held berry.

name: Feint
description: Hits through Protect and Detect.

name: Pluck
description: If target has a berry, inflicts double damage and uses the berry.

name: Tailwind
description: For three turns, friendly Pokémon have doubled Speed.

name: Acupressure
description: Raises one of a friendly Pokémon's stats at random by two stages.

name: Metal-burst
description: Strikes back at the last Pokémon to hit the user this turn with 1.5× the damage.

name: U-turn
description: User must switch out after attacking.

name: Close-combat
description: Lowers the user's Defense and Special Defense by one stage after inflicting damage.

name: Payback
description: Power is doubled if the target has already moved this turn.

name: Assurance
description: Power is doubled if the target has already received damage this turn.

name: Embargo
description: Target cannot use held items.

name: Fling
description: Throws held item at the target; power depends on the item.

name: Psycho-shift
description: Transfers the user's major status effect to the target.

name: Trump-card
description: Power increases when this move has less PP, up to a maximum of 200.

name: Heal-block
description: Prevents target from restoring its HP for five turns.

name: Wring-out
description: Power increases against targets with more HP remaining, up to a maximum of 121 power.

name: Power-trick
description: User swaps Attack and Defense.

name: Gastro-acid
description: Nullifies target's ability until it leaves battle.

name: Lucky-chant
description: Prevents the target from scoring critical hits for five turns.

name: Me-first
description: Uses the target's move against it before it attacks, with power increased by half.

name: Copycat
description: Uses the target's last used move.

name: Power-swap
description: User swaps Attack and Special Attack changes with the target.

name: Guard-swap
description: User swaps Defense and Special Defense changes with the target.

name: Punishment
description: Power increases against targets with more raised stats, up to a maximum of 200.

name: Last-resort
description: Can only be used after all of the user's other moves have been used.

name: Worry-seed
description: Changes the target's ability to Insomnia.

name: Sucker-punch
description: Only works if the target is about to use a damaging move.

name: Toxic-spikes
description: Scatters poisoned spikes, poisoning opposing Pokémon that switch in.

name: Heart-swap
description: User and target swap stat changes.

name: Aqua-ring
description: Restores 1/16 of the user's max HP each turn.

name: Magnet-rise
description: User is immune to Ground moves and effects for five turns.

name: Flare-blitz
description: User takes 1/3 the damage inflicted in recoil.  Has a 10% chance to burn the target.

name: Force-palm
description: Has a 30% chance to paralyze the target.

name: Aura-sphere
description: Never misses.

name: Rock-polish
description: Raises the user's Speed by two stages.

name: Poison-jab
description: Has a 30% chance to poison the target.

name: Dark-pulse
description: Has a 20% chance to make the target flinch.

name: Night-slash
description: Has an increased chance for a critical hit.
